column1: Table 13. Estimated percent of sentenced prisoners under state jurisdiction, by offense and sex, race, and Hispanic origin, December 31, 2012
Data source(s): National Prisoner Statistics Program, National Corrections Reporting Program, Survey of Inmates in State Correctional Facilities
Table 13. Estimated percent of sentenced prisoners under state jurisdiction, by offense and sex, race, and Hispanic origin, December 31, 2012

Note: Estimates are based on state prisoners with a sentence of more than a year under the jurisdiction of state correctional officials. Detail may not sum to total due to rounding and missing offense data. See Methodology.
a/Includes American Indians, Alaska Natives, Asians, Native Hawaiians, Pacific Islanders, persons of two or more races, or additional racial categories in reporting information systems.
b/Excludes persons of Hispanic or Latino origin and persons of two or more races.
d/Includes trafficking and other drug offenses.
e/Includes weapons, drunk driving, and court offenses; commercialized vice, morals, and decency offenses; and liquor law violations and other public-order offenses.
f/Includes juvenile offenses and other unspecified offense categories.
Sources: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics Program and National Corrections Reporting Program, 2012; and Survey of Inmates in State Correctional Facilities, 2004.
